org.gvsig.chart.legend

Interface IChartLegend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, DrawingObservable, IClassifiedLegend, IClassifiedVectorLegend, ILegend, IVectorialUniqueValueLegend, IVectorLegend, Legend, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBarsChartLegend, ILinkedChartLegend, IPieChartLegend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarsChartLegend, LinkedChartLegend, PieChartLegend

    public interface IChartLegend
extends IVectorialUniqueValueLegend
    Interface to represents charts legend.
